BenefitsCustomerPage.title: Customer Benefits
BenefitsCustomerPage.subtitle: Experience professional, convenient and safe repair services with EzyFix
BenefitsCustomerPage.cta_subtitle: Download the EzyFix app today and enjoy all the benefits above!
BenefitsCustomerPage.convenience_item1_desc: With just a few taps on your phone, you can book repair services at any time of day, no need to call or find technicians.
BenefitsCustomerPage.convenience_item2_desc: EzyFix's AI system will automatically find and connect you with the nearest technician, saving waiting time.
BenefitsCustomerPage.convenience_item3_desc: Receive step-by-step notifications: Technician is on the way, working, completed. You're always informed.
BenefitsCustomerPage.convenience_item4_desc: All transactions are stored in the app, easy to review when needed.
BenefitsCustomerPage.safety_item1_desc: All technicians on EzyFix must verify their ID card and personal information before being allowed to accept jobs.
BenefitsCustomerPage.safety_item2_desc: 5-star rating system from real customers helps you choose reputable, high-quality technicians.
BenefitsCustomerPage.safety_item3_desc: Customer care team is always ready to help if you encounter problems while using the service.
BenefitsCustomerPage.safety_item4_desc: Repair work comes with specific warranty periods, giving you peace of mind.
BenefitsCustomerPage.pricing_item1_desc: Receive detailed quotes from technicians before deciding. No hidden costs.
BenefitsCustomerPage.pricing_item2_desc: Can receive multiple quotes from different technicians to choose the most suitable price for your budget.
BenefitsCustomerPage.pricing_item3_desc: Support multiple methods: Cash, bank transfer, e-wallets (MoMo, ZaloPay), credit cards.
BenefitsCustomerPage.pricing_item4_desc: If not satisfied with the quality, you have the right to complain and receive refund support according to policy.

BenefitsTechnicianPage.title: Technician Benefits
BenefitsTechnicianPage.subtitle: Increase your income and grow your career with the EzyFix platform
BenefitsTechnicianPage.cta_subtitle: Register as an EzyFix technician today and start earning!
BenefitsTechnicianPage.income_item1_desc: AI system automatically connects you with thousands of customers needing services daily. No need to worry about finding work or waiting.
BenefitsTechnicianPage.income_item2_desc: You set your own price and negotiate with customers. EzyFix only charges a reasonable service fee, the rest goes to you.
BenefitsTechnicianPage.income_item3_desc: Money will be transferred to your account within 24-48 hours after completing the job.
BenefitsTechnicianPage.income_item4_desc: Outstanding technicians with many 5-star reviews will receive monthly, quarterly bonuses and special offers.
BenefitsTechnicianPage.support_item1_desc: Your information is absolutely confidential. Customers do not see your personal phone number.
BenefitsTechnicianPage.support_item2_desc: If disputes arise, EzyFix will have a legal team to support you in resolving issues.
BenefitsTechnicianPage.support_item3_desc: Participate in soft skills, customer care, and new technical courses to improve your profession.
BenefitsTechnicianPage.support_item4_desc: You have the full right to decline jobs that don't suit your skills or schedule.
BenefitsTechnicianPage.flexibility_item1_desc: Turn Online mode on when free, off when busy. No time constraints, work on your own schedule.
BenefitsTechnicianPage.flexibility_item2_desc: Choose the area you want to receive jobs: Near home, around familiar areas, move freely.
BenefitsTechnicianPage.flexibility_item3_desc: When working through a reputable platform like EzyFix, customers feel more secure and willing to pay higher for quality service.
BenefitsTechnicianPage.flexibility_item4_desc: Accumulate 5-star reviews and positive feedback to build a sustainable personal brand in the industry.
BenefitsTechnicianPage.benefits_item1_desc: Receive rewards for completing a certain number of orders, outstanding monthly bonuses, gifts on holidays.
BenefitsTechnicianPage.benefits_item2_desc: Get discounts when buying tools and spare parts from EzyFix partners.
BenefitsTechnicianPage.benefits_item3_desc: Technicians participating in the insurance program receive partial fee support to ensure safety at work.
BenefitsTechnicianPage.benefits_item4_desc: Join the EzyFix technician group to learn experiences, share tips, connect and support each other.

RulesCustomerPage.title: Customer Code of Conduct
RulesCustomerPage.subtitle: Guidelines for using the service correctly to have the best experience
RulesCustomerPage.intro_platform: - a safe, transparent and professional repair service connection platform.
RulesCustomerPage.intro_purpose: To bring the best experience to both Customers and Technicians, we build a code of conduct to ensure all interactions on the platform are civilized and effective.
RulesCustomerPage.intro_agreement: By using the service, you agree to comply with the following rules.
RulesCustomerPage.rules_section_subtitle: 4 basic principles to ensure the best service experience
RulesCustomerPage.rule1_item1: Polite communication: Please maintain a gentle, polite attitude and respect technicians throughout the service
RulesCustomerPage.rule1_item2: No discrimination: Strictly prohibit any use of words, gestures that are derogatory, discriminatory, harassing or offensive to technicians
RulesCustomerPage.rule2_item1: Accurately describe the problem: Provide complete, accurate information about the repair needed so technicians can prepare best
RulesCustomerPage.rule2_item2: Clear address and time: Ensure address information and appointment time are accurate. If there are changes, notify technicians early
RulesCustomerPage.rule3_item1: Pay as agreed: After completing the work, please pay the full amount agreed with the technician
RulesCustomerPage.rule3_item2: No unilateral price changes: Not allowed to arbitrarily reduce price or refuse payment after agreeing to the quote
RulesCustomerPage.rule4_item1: Honest reviews: Please rate based on actual service quality, do not intentionally lower or raise ratings untruthfully
RulesCustomerPage.rule4_item2: Constructive feedback: If not satisfied, provide constructive feedback to help technicians improve
RulesCustomerPage.important_note_content: Serious or repeated violations of the above rules may result in account warning, temporary suspension or permanent termination of service rights.
RulesCustomerPage.violation_desc: To maintain a fair environment, EzyFix will apply appropriate measures when violations are detected:

RulesCustomerPage.community_message: Together building a trusted and quality service community

RulesTechnicianPage.title: Technician Code of Conduct
RulesTechnicianPage.subtitle: Commitment to service quality and professional ethics
RulesTechnicianPage.intro_platform: - a reputable, professional repair service connection platform in Vietnam.
RulesTechnicianPage.intro_purpose: This Code of Conduct defines standards of behavior, professional ethics and responsibilities that all Technicians must comply with when operating on the platform.
RulesTechnicianPage.intro_agreement: By registering and using the app, you confirm that you have read and agree to comply with all terms in this Code.
RulesTechnicianPage.section1_sub1_point1: Attire: Always wear clean, neat uniforms throughout the work process
RulesTechnicianPage.section1_sub1_point2: Communication: Polite, friendly attitude and respect for customers. Do not use vulgar language
RulesTechnicianPage.section1_sub1_point3: Attitude: Show dedication, cooperation and willingness to support customers
RulesTechnicianPage.section1_sub2_point1: Arrive on time or notify in advance if there is a delay
RulesTechnicianPage.section1_sub2_point2: Complete work on time as committed
RulesTechnicianPage.section1_sub2_point3: Do not cancel orders suddenly except in force majeure cases
RulesTechnicianPage.section2_sub1_point1: Only accept jobs within your area of expertise
RulesTechnicianPage.section2_sub1_point2: Ensure repair quality meets technical standards
RulesTechnicianPage.section2_sub1_point3: Provide warranty for work performed (if applicable)
RulesTechnicianPage.section2_sub2_point1: Quote honestly and clearly before starting
RulesTechnicianPage.section2_sub2_point2: Do not inflate prices or charge beyond the initial agreement
RulesTechnicianPage.section2_sub2_point3: Advise honestly about damage condition, do not intentionally exaggerate to increase price
RulesTechnicianPage.section3_sub1_point1: Comply with work safety regulations when working
RulesTechnicianPage.section3_sub1_point2: Use tools and equipment properly to avoid accidents
RulesTechnicianPage.section3_sub2_point1: Do not disclose customer personal information to third parties
RulesTechnicianPage.section4_point1: Listen and clearly understand customer requirements before starting
RulesTechnicianPage.section4_point2: Clearly explain repair process, additional costs (if any)
RulesTechnicianPage.section4_point3: Respond to messages, calls from customers promptly
RulesTechnicianPage.section5_item1: Fraud, deception in quoting or service quality
RulesTechnicianPage.section5_item3: Accept jobs outside the app to avoid service fees
RulesTechnicianPage.section5_item4: Use fake accounts or inaccurate information
RulesTechnicianPage.consequences_item2: Account suspension: Serious violations or repeated offenses
RulesTechnicianPage.consequences_item3: Permanent termination of cooperation: Very serious violations or fraud
RulesTechnicianPage.commitment_item1: Support technicians in developing skills and careers
RulesTechnicianPage.commitment_item3: Build a fair, transparent working environment
RulesTechnicianPage.reward_desc: EzyFix always recognizes and values positive contributions. Outstanding technicians will receive:

PrivacyPolicy.meta_description: EzyFix Privacy Policy - Our commitment to protecting your privacy and personal information
PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.subtitle: Our commitment to protecting your privacy
PrivacyPolicy.introduction: EzyFix ("we", "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information when you use the EzyFix application.
section1_items1: Account information: Name, email, phone number, password
Profile information: Profile picture, address, payment information
Service information: Repair request description, on-site photos
Transaction information: Order history, payments, reviews
section1_items2: Location data: GPS for finding nearby technicians and routing

Background location tracking: When you have an active order (as a technician), the app continues to track your location in the background to display real-time location to customers. You can disable this feature in Settings, but the order tracking function will not work
Device information: Model, operating system, device ID
Usage data: Usage time, features used, error logs
Network information: IP address, connection type
Local storage data: App settings, login status, and user preferences stored on your device (not shared with servers)
Microphone (Audio recording): Used when you send voice messages or make support calls within the app (only when you actively use it)
Appointment and reminders: The app requires permission to set exact alarms to send timely reminders about repair appointments
section1_items3: Authentication: Information from Google, Facebook (if logged in via social networks)
Maps: Data from Google Maps API
section3_items1: Customer name, phone number, address (when there is an order)
section3_items4: Authorities (when there is a court order)
PrivacyPolicy.section3_no_sell: We DO NOT sell your personal information
section5_items1: View personal information in the app
section5_items2: Request account deletion: Settings > Account > Delete Account
Email: support@ezyfix.com with subject "Delete My Account"
Data will be deleted within 30 days
section5_items3: Turn off marketing notifications: Settings > Notifications
Turn off GPS: Device settings (but will limit functionality)
Turn off background location tracking: Settings > Permissions > Location > "Only while using the app"
Turn off microphone permission: Device Settings > App permissions > Microphone
section5_items4: Regulatory authority: Ministry of Information and Communications
section6_items1: Active accounts: Throughout the usage period
After account deletion: Personal data deleted after 30 days
Transaction data: Retained for 7 years (as required by law)
Anonymous data: May be retained indefinitely
PrivacyPolicy.notice_content: EzyFix is not intended for users under 13 years of age. If we discover data from children under 13, we will delete it immediately. Parents can contact: support@ezyfix.com
PrivacyPolicy.footer_note: By using EzyFix, you agree to this Privacy Policy. This policy is drafted in accordance with Vietnam's Decree 13/2023/ND-CP on Personal Data Protection and the EU GDPR.
